title: U.S. opinion poll : sexiest musical instrument 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
The highest Response Guitar has 21.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Flute.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 26.0 is found at Response Guitar and the minimum is found at Flute where Response is 5.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 26.0 is found at Response Guitar and the minimum is found at Flute where Response is 5.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response Saxophone.
There is a difference of 21.0 between the maximum Response Guitar and minimum Response Flute.
The Response Guitar has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Saxophone, and Piano. Down to the Response Flute which is the lowest.
The Response Guitar tends to be 1.59 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 98.0.
